import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useAuth } from './AuthContext' import './ToolBar_css.css' const ToolBar = () => { const {currentUser, logout} = useAuth() const navigate= useNavigate() const [isToggled, setisToggled] = useState(false) const handleLogOut = () =>{ logout() navigate('/login') return } const toggleToolbar = () => { setisToggled(!isToggled) } return ( <>

MeetMyCar

Ride With Us

{currentUser.email}

  • Home
  • Profile
  • Setting
) } export default ToolBar
